item.title: Sony slaps down fan-made Concord resurrection effort with copyright takedown and "worrying legal action" - Eurogamer
item.description:
1. Sony slaps down fan-made Concord resurrection effort with copyright takedown and "worrying legal action"  Eurogamer
  2. Sony’s Concord Is Playable Again Thanks To Fan-Made Custom Servers  The Game Post
  3. Shortly after Concord's resurrection by fans, it looks like Sony might be about to kill it again: 'Due to worrying legal action we’ve decided to pause invites for the time being'  PC Gamer
  4. PS5 Game Shutdown in 2024 Playable Again Through Fan Servers  ComicBook.com
  5. Sony's canceled Concord is once again playable, thanks to custom servers  Polygon
